course_title: Adult/Gerontology Primary Care Nurse Practitioner I
class_notes: Online with synchronous sessions TBD. On campus intensives TBD.
course_description: This is the first course focused on diagnosing and managing health problems, episodic and chronic, in the adult and older adult patient populations. Emphasis is on the role of the nurse practitioner as direct care provider, consultant, and interdisciplinary team member.
prerequisites: NRSG 562D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2561, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
